tagline: Designs the rituals and norms that make good culture the path of least resistance
pros: Turns vague 'culture' goals into specific practices
Designs rituals people actually want to do
Measures behavioral change, not just sentiment
cons: Needs team context — less useful in solo projects
Interventions take time to show results

model_recommendations.notes: Prioritizes voice, tone, and creative quality over analytical depth. Thinking/reasoning can hurt creative output — keep low or off.
